TLDR: One of a kind game that has plenty of fun to be had, but the devs as well as the community are not the best.

Dead by Daylight is a one of a kind game that can provide fun and original moments either solo or with some friends. However, the devs leave bugs in the game for long periods of time, the community is full of many voices with different opinions on what the game should be, and the monetization of the game is insane (around $120 for all gameplay content at this time). Dead by Daylight might not have a great new player experience but if you stick around long enough I believe that there is plenty of fun to be had.

Game is really only fun with friends. It is neat to play as iconic killers don't get me wrong but just the thought and decisions the devs have made, I have no interest in this game anymore. Been to rank 1 on survivor and killer with over 1,000 in game, so I am good. Matchmaking has been horrible from day 1, never been fixed but we have like 10+ DLC's out a full market of items to buy with money. Deadicated (pun) servers are a joke. Also, you can play games for hours on end, no issue, then game will crash due to software error (sure no worries), you come back and have a huge time ban. Yup, worst update in gaming history. This is the ONLY game to punish you for leaving. Call of Duty, Friday the 13th, etc. you just leave and find a new match no issues. So I will be more than happy to take my money elsewhere and I won't come back unless they remove the time ban penalty for DC. EVERY streamer complains about it, such a horrible way to make a game.

Vou deixar minha análise depois de jogar solo e com amigos. Tentar também resumir um pouco o game 

Com amigos: a diversão e a tensão é certa, você é seus amigos vão criar táticas para ganhar do monstro sem ter dificuldade nenhuma, sempre se ajudando, rindo, e aproveitando essa tensão juntos, pois é um game muito tenso do começo ao fim, quando vc terminar de logar os gerados e não consegue passar pela porta sem deixar ninguém para trás e acabar morrendo por tentar salvar os outros kkkkk, é muito bom, vale muito a pena jogar com amigos.

Solo player: é aí que a depresso bate, mas aí você joga como monstro e mata os 4 amiguinhos que estão jogando e rindo  de você por não ter amigos, você vai mostrar a eles quem manda nessa pourra matar todo mundo que estão jogando em ptzinha, piadas a parte, jogar sozinho tbm vale a pena, você pode ir jogando de killer ou sobrevivente conhecendo gente nova.

O jogo é maravilhoso, são poucas coisas que faltam para deixar o game perfeito, como chat de voz no jogo ou pelo menos somente um chat, porque quando você está jogando solo, fica muito hard se comunicar com os outros, você precisa se virar com 2 animações que o game lhe dá

Lá tem um sistema de xp para cada personagem, o máximo é lvl 50, de acordo com o nível que você vai subindo, voce vai escolhendo uns itens que vão lhe dar vantagens dentro do jogo, como se fosse uma bild, que são tanto para os sobreviventes como para o killer, e quando vc aprender a montar umas bilds  loucas, ninguém para você :) 

Vale muito a pena comprar esse jogo, aproveite bastante ele e se precisar de alguém para jogar e jogar umas personalizadas, pode add :D

This game has come a long, LONG way from what it originally was. Exploits are being fixed, perks are being balanced, and there is always more content being churned out from cosmetics to new killers and survivors. It's a marvelous game when it works as intended (sometimes there are bugs and survivor friends can cause killers the occasional headache) and we should applaud the developers.

dead by daylight is a very good game BUT here's some of the few things you need to know. 1: it's actually 2 games in 1, when you first start playing, dead by daylight is a scary game where you need to hide from the killer, everyone gets killed almost every time and escaping from the match is quite the accomplishment. and why the hell is leatherface this strong BUT THEN you learn to play, learn to do risky plays to save your team, learn to correctly utilize pallets and windows to make the killer waste more time on you, letting your team do generators and actually escaping the match quite often. and WAOW leatherface is a garbage killer. when you've learnt to play the game is totally different. it goes from a terrifying horror game where you're going to die, its just a matter of when. to a competitive horror teamed cat and mouse game.

Even if in recent times i've grown tired of the game i cannot in good faith rate dead by daylight as a bad game.

The tomes have been a massive plus to the game giving challenges to complete and Bloopoints to boot reducing the grind by a massive amount. This is very helpful especially for the newer crowd who will be met with more survivors and killers than they know what to do with when they first start. 

The devs honestly try their best even if at times it seems they don't care or cater more to one side or the other. Balancing around the 1% of games where the games are completely unbalanced because of the 4vs1 nature of the game and what can be accomplished by playing perfectly isn't something we should strive for. Most players are not going to play perfectly and in fact far from it. 

The game is addicting and fun especially with friends, but after awhile burnout will set in you will drop the game for 6 months to a year. Before you eventually come back and log in another 200 hours into the Dead by Daylight Experience.
